messages.subject: Fanfiction contest results
messages.msgSnippet: Maybe I m a little slow for just noticing, but the Results of the Samurai Archives fanfiction contest are out. http://www.samurai-archives.com/guestart.html
messages.messageBody:
Maybe I'm a little slow for just noticing, but the Results of the
Samurai Archives fanfiction contest are out.

http://www.samurai-archives.com/guestart.html
(scroll down near the bottom)

There are only two Bakumatsu-era ones. Mine is the one entitled "Snow."
It's the only Shinsengumi one too. ^^;
